/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the urban environment and the weather conditions.
